name: Meat VS Beat
description:
Global Game Jam Game ~

Meat vs Beat network multiplayer game with asymetric gameplay. The first game is a platformer in which the character must eat to regain energy, but eating junk food will give bonuses to the second player. In the second game, the player must collect fat inside the body of the character, in order to invade its members, making them unusable by the first player.

Important! Unexplained controls of the second game: X to create a gatherer (50 lipids), C to create a fighter (100 lipids).
